Description: Avail 9/1! Excellent 2 bed/ 1.5 bath near the beach! Spacious living room area with tons of natural light streaming from the bay windows, and half bath just off of the living area. The eat in kitchen has granite countertops, gas range, dishwasher, ample cabinet space, and a dining nook. Off the dining area is a private shaded deck. The lower living level has two oversized bedrooms with great closet space. Full bath is located between bedrooms as well as in unit laundry. Off the back bedroom there is access to the private patio. Easy access to public transportation, major highways & Boston!
